description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Layer Cake With Fresh Berries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chocolate Layer Cake With Fresh Berries
name: Chocolate Layer Cake With Fresh Berries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Sandwich the cakes together using half the ganache for the first 3 layers. Spread the remainder on the top and sides and rough up with a knife. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings or decorate with fresh berries, if you like.
